animalCare.title: Air quality Solutions for Animal care

logisticsBanner.title: Air quality solutions for
logisticsBanner.description: Innovative solutions for logistics firms to reduce their environmental impact, protect public wellness, and contribute to a cleaner, greener future.
logisticsBanner.subtitle: Warehouse | Ports | Transportation

logisticsFactors.title: Factors affecting air quality in
logisticsFactors.description: Logistics sectors involve various activities that contribute to air pollution through various pollutant emissions, such as:

pm.title:
Particulate Matter
(PM2.5 and PM10)
pm.description: Diesel trucks and locomotives, handling equipment and loading operations emit PM.

vocs.title:
Volatile Organic
Compounds (VOCs)
vocs.description: Vehicles, industrial processes, heating systems, and packaging activities emit VOCs.

co.title:
Carbon
Monoxide (CO)
co.description: Fuel combustion, handling equipment, loading and unloading operations releases CO.

nox.title:
Nitrogen
Oxides (NOx)
nox.description: Fossil fuel combustion in trucks and shipping vessels, heating systems, etc. suspend NOx.

logisticsQuote.title: DO YOU KNOW?
logisticsQuote.content: According to the International Agency for Research on Cancer (IARC), diesel engine exhaust is carcinogenic to humans as its exposure increases the risk of lung cancer.

logisticsConcern.title: Areas of
logisticsConcern.description: Logistics sectors are bustling with activity and face significant challenges when it comes to maintaining good air quality.

warehouse.title: Warehouse Facilities
warehouse.description: Highly trap pollutants due to enclosed spaces and heavy operations.

loadingDocks.title: Loading Docks
loadingDocks.description: Loading and unloading operations and vehicle emissions release pollutants emissions.

transportationRoutes.title: Transportation Routes
transportationRoutes.description: Diesel vehicle emissions in major routes affect the nearby and commercial areas.

logisticsHubs.title: Logistics Hubs
logisticsHubs.description: Continuous operations in high-activity centres result in localized pollution.

logisticsRisk.title: Who is at
logisticsRisk.description: Air quality issues in the logistics sector pose various health risk for everyone involved.

workers.title: Logistics Workers
workers.description: Prolonged pollutants exposure lead to respiratory and cardiovascular issues.

residents.title: Nearby Residents
residents.description: People living near logistics hubs have higher health risk due to pollutants.

drivers.title: Drivers
drivers.description: Drives highly exposed harmful pollutants due to Extended periods in vehicles.

deliveryPersonnel.title: Delivery Personnel
deliveryPersonnel.description: Long-term harmful pollutants exposure while delivering or pickups.

logisticsSolutions.title: Air quality
logisticsSolutions.description: Maintaining air quality is crucial in the logistics sector for the well-being of everyone. It requires a multi-faceted approach with advanced air quality monitoring, pollution control strategies etc.

monitors.title: Prana Air Sensible+Air quality monitor
monitors.description: Installing indoor air quality monitor can help in maintaining a healthy working environment.

features.feature2: 5000 mAh Inbuilt Battery for Long Screen-Time

freshAir.title: Prana Air Fresh Air Machine
freshAir.description: Integrating an Indoor Air Purifier can help in tackling air pollution effectively in the logistics sector.

features.feature1: Filter out up to 99.5% indoor pollutants

dataDisplay.title: Prana Air Customized Data Display
dataDisplay.description: Implementing a customized digital display in the logistics sector allows continuous, 24/7 data visualization.

logisticsEffects.title: The Effects of Air Pollution
logisticsEffects.description: Poor Air Quality in the logistics sector affects workers, drivers, Residents etc. health causing various problems.

effects.effect1: Enhanced productivity for workers and drivers
effects.effect3: Clean and fresh air for everyone

logisticsClientele.description: Our partnerships with these renowned organizations reflect our commitment to excellence and innovation.

questions.q1: 1. How do logistics sectors affect the nearby residents air quality?
questions.q2: 2. What are the major pollutants in the logistic sectors?
questions.q3: 3. Why air quality is a major issue in the warehouse?
questions.q4: 4. What are the solutions for logistics sectors to improve air quality?

answers.a1: The logistics sector involves several activities that involve diesel-powered transportation and various operations that can impact nearby communities.
answers.a2: Logistics sectors include warehouses, transportation, and stationary that emit pollutants like PM2.5, NOx, CO, VOCs etc.
answers.a3: Warehouses highly trap pollutants due to Congested operational areas and impact the indoor and outdoor air quality.
answers.a4: Prana Air offers practical solutions to improve air quality in the logistics sectors as air quality monitoring systems, advanced air purifiers etc.
